body: Yeah, it's unnecessary because `requires_grad == (grad_fn != nullptr)`. I'm going to update it so that it's only called when grad_fn is not null.
body_html: Yeah, it's unnecessary because requires_grad == (grad_fn != nullptr). I'm going to update it so that it's only called when grad_fn is not null.
